Html:
Seems I have to register the following account + a domain to make Kigg2 working.

3. Create an account with the following external services:
-http://www.pageglimpse.com/
-http://www.websnapr.com/
-http://antispam.typepad.com/
-http://akismet.com/
-http://defensio.com/
-http://recaptcha.net/

Is there is a way to switch off this component?

Otherwise, It is really hard for me to run/debug in VS2008..

Correct me if I'm wrong

Hi,

I just updated it. also the instructions, at minimum you have to configure reCaptcha and WebSnapr account, everything else is optional.

I am curious. How do i create an account with the following external services? Is that something that I need to do in IIS7? I am using Windows Vista SP 1 for my development machine.

Any help?

@chuawenching:

At minimum, you have to register with either WebSnapr or PageGlimpse to show the web page thumbnail and for reCaptcha.net for Captcha. All these service are free for non-commercial usage I guess. Just visit their site for registration and API key.
There is also an instruction file in download for the minimum configuration.

Let me know if you need anything more.
